p.q0: Mariela's students are going to listen to a song of a famous singer. Here is the chorus of the song:
p.q: After having worked on different activities using the song, Mariela would like her students to develop the listening skill Inferring attitude. Taking her purpose into account, which of the following strategies is it appropriate to adopt?

as.a: Play the audio of the song and write the following questions on the board: "How does the singer feel?" and "How can you tell?" Ask the students to work in pairs and discuss those questions.
Play the audio of the song and ask the students to write down the verbs they hear. Pair up the students and have them identify the main idea of the song using the verbs they have written down.

Play the audio of the song and write the following sentences on the board: "When I listened to the song, I felt..." and "I liked/didn't like the song because..." Ask the students to complete those sentences in their notebooks.
